name: BNNSArithmeticTernary
desc: A structure that contains the inputs and output of an arithmetic operation with three inputs.

items.name: init(in1: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, in1_type: BNNSDescriptorType, in2: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, in2_type: BNNSDescriptorType, in3: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, in3_type: BNNSDescriptorType, out: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, out_type: BNNSDescriptorType)
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic structure that takes three inputs from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic structure that takes three inputs.

items.name: var in1: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the first input.

items.desc: The descriptor type of the first input.

items.name: var in2: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the second input.

items.desc: The descriptor type of the second input.

items.desc: The descriptor of the third input.

items.desc: The descriptor type of the third input.

items.name: var out_type: BNNSDescriptorType
